Can we be transparent this morning? But we need to get to the place where the psalmist is. See, I'm gonna be purposed in my praise. I'm gonna be intentional and deliberate about praising God, because God is good. I'm gonna be persistent, no matter the circumstances, no matter what's going on, from the rising of the sun to the going down of the same. I'm gonna praise his name from this day forth and forever. I'm going to praise my God. And I'm gonna be passionate about it. With my whole heart, I'm gonna praise him. See, whether you're on the mountaintop or you're in the valley, God wants to hear your praise. Someone wrote the song years ago, God Wants to Hear You Sing, and he does. He wants to hear your praise, and he's worthy of it. And oh, that God would help us this morning. I said it in Sunday school to close the Sunday school hour. As God's people, we don't need a federal holiday to cause us to be thankful. I am thankful that we have a federal holiday on our calendar that causes us to be more aware of and focused on at this time of year. I'm thankful for that. But the reality is that every single day, we ought to be thanking God. Oh, that God would help us to not be caught up in the culture and the society of being an unthankful people or a complaining people, but that God would help us to praise his name. Let's pray together. Father, we love you. How we thank you for loving us. We thank you for the word of God. We thank you for the truth contained therein. We thank you for the example of the psalmist. And Lord, as we look at the example of the psalmist, we are challenged. I pray that you would help each of us, Lord, to be purposed, to be persistent, to be passionate in our praise of thee. Lord, perhaps there's one here that's not sure of heaven. They've never trusted the Lord Jesus Christ as their personal savior. If they were to die today, they do not have assurance that heaven is their home. Oh God, I pray that the Holy Spirit of God would speak to the heart of that individual and help them to understand their need for Christ. I pray they'd understand that, God, you love them. You sent your son to die for them. He suffered, bled and died. He was buried in a borrowed tomb, but he rose conquering sin, death, and the grave. He's alive forevermore. And he is the savior of the world. God, if there's one in that condition that needs to be saved, I pray that you would give us an opportunity to take a Bible and show them how they could know for sure that heaven's their home. Lord, I pray for Christians this morning that are gathered together. Oh God, I pray that you'd help us in this area of our praise. Lord, I pray that you'd help us to respond now to that which we have heard. I pray that you'd move, work as only you can. We'll thank you for every decision that's made for it's in Christ's name we pray. Would you stand with me?
